item.title: Send emails in the background using sucker punch
item.author: alberto@albertogrespan.com (Alberto Grespan)
item.description: Sucker punch gem This gem was created by @brandonhilkert with a very specific use case in mind. I’m not sure what the use case was, but, I believe it’s something like; taking advantage of Heroku web dynos, without needing to pay extra for a worker dyno (this is what I’m using it for). If It’s not; I’m leaning towards simplicity. At this point with sucker_punch in it’s version 1.0.1 became dead simple to install and use, no configuration needed.
